introduction_text: Thank you for your interest in becoming a wholesaler with My Advika Private Limited. Please provide your details in the form below, and upon review and approval, we will update your customer group to 'Wholesaler'. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us.
name: become-a-wholesaler
success_message: Thank you for submitting your request to become a wholesaler. Your request is under review. We will get back to you soon.
title: Become a Wholesaler
